pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Highly-Customized 'LaTeX' Tables // Generate 'LaTeX' tables directly from R. It builds 'LaTeX' tables in blocks in the spirit of 'ggplot2' using the + and - operators for concatenation in the vertical and horizontal dimensions, respectively. It exports tables in the 'LaTeX' tabular environment using '.tex' code. It can compile '.tex' code to 'PDF' automatically.
